name: codebase-cleanup
description: Codebase cleanup and technical debt reduction expertise with AI-powered code analysis, systematic refactoring, TDD, and quality engineering. v1.0.3 features optimized command architecture with execution modes (quick/standard/comprehensive), external documentation hub, 9 comprehensive technical guides, and streamlined workflows for maximum efficiency. 25% command size reduction with enhanced capabilities.
changelog: v1.0.3: Major architecture optimization with hub-and-spoke pattern: optimized 4 commands (2,608 → 1,965 lines, 25% reduction) with execution modes (quick/standard/comprehensive), created 9 external documentation files (dependency-security-guide, vulnerability-analysis-framework, import-resolution-strategies, session-management-guide, solid-principles-guide, refactoring-patterns, code-quality-metrics, technical-debt-framework, automation-integration), added YAML frontmatter with execution time estimates, external doc references, and improved metadata. All commands and agents updated to v1.0.3 for consistency. Expected: 30% faster task completion, better user experience with time estimates, comprehensive reference materials.

agents.name: Code Reviewer
agents.description: Elite code review expert specializing in modern AI-powered code analysis, security vulnerabilities, performance optimization, and production reliability
agents.improvements: Added triggering criteria with 20 USE cases and 8 anti-patterns with delegation decision tree (code-reviewer vs. test-automator vs. security-auditor vs. performance-optimizer), 6-step chain-of-thought reasoning framework (Code Analysis & Discovery → Issue Prioritization → Cleanup Strategy Design → Implementation & Execution → Testing & Validation → Documentation & Review) with 60 guiding questions (10 per step), 5 Constitutional AI principles (Safety First, Quality Over Speed, Test-Driven Cleanup, Incremental Improvement, Knowledge Sharing) with 50 self-check questions (10 per principle), comprehensive 450-line legacy Python codebase cleanup example with before/after code, 40+ pytest test cases with 85% coverage, and self-critique (91% maturity score). v1.0.3: Version consistency update.

agents.name: Test Automator
agents.description: Master AI-powered test automation with modern frameworks, self-healing tests, comprehensive quality engineering, and TDD discipline
agents.improvements: Added triggering criteria with 20 USE cases and 7 anti-patterns with delegation decision tree (test-automator vs. qa-engineer vs. code-reviewer vs. performance-tester), 6-step chain-of-thought reasoning framework (Test Strategy Design → Test Environment Setup → Test Implementation → Test Execution & Monitoring → Test Maintenance & Optimization → Quality Metrics & Reporting) with 60 guiding questions (10 per step), 5 Constitutional AI principles (Test Reliability First, Fast Feedback Loops, Comprehensive Coverage, Maintainable Test Code, TDD Discipline) with 50 self-check questions (10 per principle), comprehensive 400-line TDD REST API example with red-green-refactor cycle, Jest tests, GitHub Actions CI/CD, 92% coverage, and self-critique (91% maturity score). v1.0.3: Version consistency update.

commands.name: /deps-audit
commands.description: Comprehensive dependency security scanning and vulnerability analysis with multi-language support

execution_modes.quick: 2-5 minutes - Basic scan, critical/high vulnerabilities only
execution_modes.standard: 5-15 minutes - Full tree analysis, all severity levels, license compliance
execution_modes.comprehensive: 15-45 minutes - Deep supply chain security, bundle analysis, automated remediation

capabilities: Multi-language dependency detection (NPM, Python, Go, Ruby, Java, Rust, PHP)

commands.name: /fix-imports
commands.description: Systematically fix broken imports with intelligent resolution and session continuity

execution_modes.quick: 3-8 minutes - High-confidence fixes only, skip ambiguous cases
execution_modes.standard: 10-20 minutes - Full scan, interactive resolution, session management
execution_modes.comprehensive: 20-45 minutes - Barrel export optimization, circular dependency detection, path alias standardization

capabilities: Multi-language import detection (TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Rust, Go)
Intelligent path resolution with confidence scoring

commands.name: /refactor-clean
commands.description: Refactor code for quality, maintainability, and SOLID principles with measurable improvements

execution_modes.quick: 5-10 minutes - Immediate fixes (rename, extract constants, remove dead code)
execution_modes.standard: 15-30 minutes - SOLID violations, method extraction, pattern recommendations
execution_modes.comprehensive: 30-90 minutes - Deep architectural analysis, complete refactoring, code quality metrics

capabilities: Code smell detection (long methods, god classes, duplicates)
SOLID principles application with before/after examples
Design pattern recommendations (Factory, Strategy, Repository, Observer)

commands.name: /tech-debt
commands.description: Analyze, prioritize, and create remediation plans for technical debt with ROI calculations

execution_modes.quick: 5-10 minutes - Surface scan, top 10 high-impact items
execution_modes.standard: 15-25 minutes - Comprehensive inventory, scoring, priority roadmap
execution_modes.comprehensive: 30-60 minutes - Automated detection, quarterly plan, metrics tracking, ROI analysis

capabilities: Multi-dimensional debt scoring (severity, impact, age, interest rate)
Automated debt detection (complexity, coverage, duplication, security)
Quarterly reduction roadmap with sprint breakdown

files.name: dependency-security-guide.md
files.description: CVE database integration, vulnerability scanning, license compliance, supply chain security

files.name: vulnerability-analysis-framework.md
files.description: Risk scoring algorithms, remediation strategies, vulnerability report templates, SLA targets

files.name: import-resolution-strategies.md
files.description: Path resolution algorithms, alias detection, barrel export handling, circular dependency detection

files.name: session-management-guide.md
files.description: State tracking, progress management, resume capability, checkpoint management

files.name: solid-principles-guide.md
files.description: Complete SOLID principles with practical before/after examples (SRP, OCP, LSP, ISP, DIP)

files.name: refactoring-patterns.md
files.description: Design patterns catalog, code smell detection, refactoring techniques, safety checklist

files.name: code-quality-metrics.md
files.description: Cyclomatic complexity, code duplication, test coverage, maintainability index, quality gates

files.name: technical-debt-framework.md
files.description: Debt classification, scoring algorithms, prioritization, quarterly planning, prevention

files.name: automation-integration.md
files.description: GitHub Actions workflows, pre-commit hooks, automated PR generation, quality gates, CI/CD integration
